name: Wii Fit U Quick Check
description: The Wii Fit U Quick Check software allows you to perform a Body Test, check out your graphs and transfer your Fit Meter data, without starting up the actual Wii Fit U software or having the Wii Fit U disc inserted. If you have the retail version of Wii Fit U, Wii Fit U Quick Check lets you easily transfer Fit Meter data, do the Body Test, and check your graphs without using the Wii Fit U disc.
